lst.name: sentence
lst.str: During his trip to Washington, which runs from April 26 to 29, Bangemann will meet Secretary of State George Shultz, trade envoy Clayton Yeutter, World Bank President Barber Conable, IMF Managing Director Michel Camdessus and Paul Volcker, Chairman of the Federal Reserve Board.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In a paper prepared ahead of his trip, Bangemann said Bonn's trading partners had been asking whether West German growth was slowing and whether the Federal Republic should not in the future pursue more strongly expansionary policies.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While West Germany did not seek exchange rates which unilaterally favoured its exports, it favoured more stability and realistic rates, which corresponded to "fundamentals."
